Title: The Nutcracker and the Four Realms
Writer: Ashleigh Powell (screen story by), Ashleigh Powell (screenplay by), E.T.A. Hoffmann (suggested by the short story "The Nutcracker and the Mouse King" written by), Marius Petipa (suggested by the "Nutcracker Ballet" by)
Actors: Mackenzie Foy, Tom Sweet, Meera Syal, Ellie Bamber
Plot: A young girl is transported into a magical world of gingerbread soldiers and an army of mice.
